Text: How do you extract these?  Used Catenator (on my mac, PC explained is fine too) to extract the .Part file(s) then there is a .PAR file.  Feels like it never ends, suggestions?  Any help is appreciated, thank you for the U/L! Am seeding.
Ok never mind -> just deleted the .PAR to make it the .mkv extension and works fine.  Thank you again ULer!! you rock!
Sounds like a lot of crap to go through when you could just get the damn avi file.
There's no PAR file, and there's nothing to extract.  Couldn't be easier.  And I'll take an MKV over an AVI.
Have to agree couldn't be easier to watch these on a PC. Using VLC Media Player here which plays any audio/video I've EVER come across so far. THANKS for this full season quality release!
